Start2.Body:
You return in a flash; the time machine worked! The Professor's a genius! Now you just need to find her... 
but wait, you're right where you left and she's nowhere in sight.

Hub.Body: You get your bearings, and it's the same old office of hers. Her computer terminal and desk is in the corner, the door is behind you, and for whatever reason you're drawn to the eye-level air duct.

Choices.Text: Take a look at the Professor's Terminal?

Air Duct.Body: You crawl through, and it's really musty in here. Surprisingly spacious though.

Air Duct Cycle Start.Body: You continue forward, noting an even more obnoxious smell. Nothing else of note.

Air Duct Cycle 2.Body: 'One foot... over the other' you sing miserably. Not an end in sight.

Choices.Text: Wait is there something in the corner over there?

Air Duct Cycle 3.Body: Your sisyphean crawl continues, with only empty duct remaining.

Failed Duct.Body:
You turn and fall straight from the ceiling onto the same spot you time traveled back to! 
You look up in wonder and note there isn't actually a duct in the ceiling... weird.

Successful Duct.Body:
You turn and fall straight from the ceiling onto the same spot you time traveled back to! 
You look up in wonder and note there isn't actually a duct in the ceiling... weird.

Choices.Text: Better get that USB in the desk

Air Duct EndS.Body: You look a little closer and... there IS something there!

USB.Body: It's a USB! 'I bet it can open the professor's desk!' you think to yourself.

Terminal.Body:
It's her oversized terminal. Underneath it is her desk, that thing has all her stuff, maybe even a spare key? 
And hey, it looks like something is playing on the monitor!

Choices.Text: No time for distractions, open that desk!
Go back to the spot you appeared at

UseUSB.Body:
It's her oversized terminal. Underneath it is her desk, that thing has all her stuff, maybe even a spare key? 
And hey, it looks like something is playing on the monitor!

Choices.Text: No time for distractions, open that desk!
Go back to the spot you appeared at

Livestream.Body:
It's a couple of attractive men talking about nonsense. 'I lost my keys so I had to look in every corner. You guys should try it sometimes.' 
Despite the dumb, simplistic story, you think to yourself 'did I try that?'

Key.Body: You plug in the USB and the desk pops open a second later as the terminal processes. Finally! You spot a big shiny key.

Nope1.Body: You turn the handle... and it's locked. Why on Earth would she lock the door from the inside?

Nope2.Body: 'Yeah right, good luck getting into that desk without the code the Professor runs from the terminal to unlock it' you mutter.

Nope3.Body: You barely have to think about it for a moment:

Choices.Text: 'Eh, who's got time to search in corners?'

EndS.Body:
You turn the key with haste and throw the door open... only to bump into the Professor! Turns out she was just on her way in... no need to do all that. 
She's beaming with excitement on your time travelling, and you can't wait to tell her...
